sen.j: 寛永6年（1629年）の紫衣事件や将軍徳川家光の乳母春日局が無官のまま参内した事件に、江戸幕府への憤りを覚えた父の後水尾天皇から突然の内親王宣下と譲位を受け、興子内親王として7歳で践祚。
sen.e: The Emperor succeeded to the throne as Princess Okiko after receiving the sudden title Princess by Imperial order from her father, Emperor Go-Mizunoo, who was angry against the Edo government after the Shie Incident in 1629, and another incident, Shogun Iemitsu TOKUGAWA's educator, Kasuga no Tsubone went into the Imperial Palace without any official position.

sen.e: This unwritten ruleit was originally made due to avoid the trouble of Imperial succession, Emperor Go-Mizunoo used this to stop the TOKUGAWA line from the Imperial line and had an intention not to have any TOKUGAWA blood in the Imperial family, thus he made his daughter, Emperor Meisho to succeed the throne.
